description: Clean, responsive interface. Everything is here I need, ready to go. Maybe except for one thing but I can't think of what that is.
Good and fast, not many redundant. Some bugs in multiple monitor, lockscreen wallpaper, and other non-critical places.

In Ubuntu 22 this doesnt install properly and cannt be used at all, even after snapd desktop integration was updated, which apparently removed my old settings application. This does not work and everything is now broken
